question:
You have been living in a rental apartment for the past year. Recently a new neighbour moved in and has been making a lot of noise, which disturbs you.
Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter:
explain the situation
describe why it bothers you
suggest a solution
text: I'm writing as a tenant of A723, Palm Grooves Apartments in order to complain against the continuous disturbance caused by my new neighbour staying in the opposite apartment.
Mr Shahid Khanna, who has moved into this building a week ago seems to be a party lover. He keeps inviting his friends over to his house and they often talk loudly or play heavy music  most nights.

It's quite disturbing because I am unable to sleep due to the continuous noise. As a result, I'm finding it hard to get up in the morning, which in turn is affecting my work. I haven't noticed any changes even though I politely requested him a couple of times.

I would appreciate it if you could warn him about the disturbance he's causing us and  respect other residents' privacy. I would be left with no choice but to change my accommodation if  there are no positive results in the coming days.
I hope you understand my situation and take appropriate steps to resolve the issue.
